channel.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/alwayssunnyinlogan/an-old-friend-old-version-auxy
Found an old version of the app on iPad. Live recording is something I equally miss, as well as resent. Bad, because you have to scramble to press your loops and I remember having these 9 minute epics. I mean, I aimed for 3 minutes and that didn’t happen at all.
But it was also good, because you’re having a load of fun. I spend way longer on tracks in the new app these days, cutting and refining. It keels me.
So this was good to relax with.

item.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
I’m glad you kept these oldies around; it was good perspective. There’s something about a live mix that I hadn’t fully appreciated before, and I’ll definitely be taking more sanity breaks with this app in the future.

Read full topic
item.source: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)

item.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
I do have quite a few up — though I thought I deleted them. Murdering Fairies and everything after that are my oldies.

Dude! I keep sliding my finger across the screen to write multiple notes in the new app even now.

Read full topic
item.source: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)

item.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
Thanks!! If you have any back-in-the-day green-icon-auxy tracks lurking around, I’d be curious to check them out.

I noticed three features that I miss: 1) single-bar looping, 2) you can slide in the loop editor to get (for example) a bunch of consecutive 32nd notes without having to enter them individually, and 3) real time counter on playback.

Read full topic
item.source: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)

item.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Yo that was cool! It was chill and creepy at the same time, and I liked how you worked that bass!

Read full topic

item.description:
I am interested! When I get home from werk I will have a listen and share my thoughts.

Read full topic
item.source: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)

item.title: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
Great minds think alike! I enjoyed listening to this; it’s fun hear what you sound like in real time, with 4 instruments and one-shot recording.

In case you’re interested, here’s some of my own re-exploration of this app last week. Started out with some industrial sensibilities but wandered off after a couple minutes when I accidentally added bass back in with the settings all wrong. So much fun (and panic, once you hit record).

Read full topic
item.source: An Old Friend, Old Version Auxy - Sunny (Electronic)
